title: about codes
body: I purchased RP,But gift code I do not remember, what can retrieve it?

replies.body:
Hey there,

If you purchased an RP card from a physical store and lost the card but still have POP, try [contacting Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) as they might be able to help.
Be sure to attach POP (Proof of purchase) in your ticket and include as much detail as possible.

If you mean you purchased RP in game, this is applied to your account automatically and thus you would not have received a code.
I purchased RP in game, Then I got a skin cdkey, But gift code I do not remember

I'm sorry, maybe I'm not understanding.

* Did you purchase the RP in-game and was the RP credited to your account?
* Did you purchase a skin in-game with this RP? if so the skin would've been automatically added to your account and you would not have received a skin code.
* Did you purchase a skin from a third party? If so, you'll need to contact them regarding the skin code.
